replies.body: Yikes, what a god-ugly skin. All of the other Victorious skins look great, this one looks awful, bad enough Aatrox already has a Prestige skin too.
completely agree, no reason to make another aatrox skin!
Yeah, that looks unsightly. Probably because its a free skin amirite Riot?
U spelt riot wrong its actually spelt Rito
Sounds retarded
someones a bit sensitive

I usually don't mind who gets the victorious  skin because its given for free. But Im genuinely surprised that Aatrox of all champs was the choice this year. You could have chosen akali, Kaisa, or even sylas, but you chose the champ that has a Justicar skin that literally looks almost identical to victorious. Was there any thought put into this decision at all?
Hate it hate it hate it hate it. Please fix it riot. So many better candidates for the skin too.
Yes nerf and give skin.? Oh wait it's not a skin for profit XDDDD no buff ;3
{{champion:141}} When is Ornn gonna get a skin? He has only 1 skins and was released 2017
Bruh kindred has two skins and was released in 2015. She hasn't had a skin in over 1200 days lol
I was thinking these two aye. But riot makes more money of attrox
Super galaxy? lol
Super Galaxy is her second skin? Lol
Super galaxy was the worst line of skins
It genuinely looks like they haven't put in no effort into making this  years victories skin, kind of sad.

Another victorious skin for a champ the player base doesn't have much interest in... I know Riot can't account for everyone's hopes when it comes to these but still, didn't Aatrox just recently get a skin + prestige?

{{sticker:sg-zephyr}}

"a champ the player base doesn't have much interest in"

Thats why Aatrox has been pretty popular since his rework{{sticker:sg-lulu}}
He was pretty popular before his nerfs
He still is, but what can I say, I play the game and notice him in alotta games.
whats the point playing this game if theres an honor restriction to ranked rewards, clearly honor and rank are different?? be fair riot, then again that skin is terrible if i must say

I sort of get it tho, If you are going to play this game competitively i believe you should be doing it with sportsmanlike behaviour. I think its perfectly justified that players dont get ranked rewards if their honor has been penalised.

Stops trolls abit i think thats what they are aiming for. But i think if they made a rule if you go into lower ranks to trolls because you dont want to lose your rewards on your main you lose all rank for that year so they get nothing. That would instantly strangle out those trolls
And unrelated but do I have to wait till the 2022 fifa world cup to be able to buy the sweeper rammus skin???
No, pray to the rng god that you get it from orbs or chests (thats how I got it)...
Looks completely identical to Justicar Aatrox I aint complaining just sayin {{champion:266}}

I feel Sylas would have been a more fitting champion..... not Aatrox. I dont know if its a coincidence or not but ever since I hit Gold in 2017, the skins a dramatically gotten worse. Here's a list of viable candidates:
* Sylas
* Sejuani
* Pantheon? maybe?
* Nunu - Most prevalent jungler so far this season.....
* Ornn? (probs not)
* etc

Or, y'know, a support champion would have been nice.
Support mains have been looked down upon since the beginning of time.
Ornn yes he has had zero love in skins for 2 years
Abilities look cool but a bad looking skin imo.
Imagine making the skin a reskin of one the champion already has Justicar Aatrox anyone derp.....
why not an adc? isnt there only 1 adc with a victorious skin? {{sticker:sg-janna}}
There hasn't been a support champion victorious skin since Janna in 2012.. You might think Morgana was one but I believe she was predominantly played in midlane when that skin was released.
She was support then. She hasn't really been a mid main since a year or two before that. She's always been completely viable mid though for sure. She's more of a flex really.

I know she was played support at that time but I thought not nearly as much as she is now. Could have sworn she was moreso played in mid, but my memory is trash anyway lol

I still stand by "It should have been a support champ". Support's take so much trash from other players.. it would have been nice to have been rewarded with something at the end of the season.

Much as I'd love another Victorious support, that's ultimately not how they are chosen. The victorious skins are for champs that had the biggest impact in professional play throughout the season (generally the first half and a bit of the season given the time constraints on having to actually make the skin).

There is often contention between a few champs each year, but as far as I know, there weren't really any supports viably in the pool this year. The other contenders were mids and ADCs as I understand.

I know how the skins are chosen, haha.
I was simply saying I _wanted_ it to be a support.
I'd argue that thresh and braum were played enough in pro and high elo to be considered for it but whatever. 

I wish they would have at least made the victorious aatrox skin _look good_. It's awful IMO

Personally I don't *hate* it. I'd even say I like it, but it's definitely not on the level of something like Star Guardian or Dark Star. Part of that is that is Victorious skins are essentially 975 tier in a time when most of the new skins we get are 1350+ tier. Part of that is that the Victorious aesthetic doesn't appeal to me as much as the others.

My only real gripe with it is the wings. I know they had mad trouble with the wispy ones but I liked them way better than the knock-off Galio ones they went with.

At the end of the day, it's a free skin so I can't be too mad about it. Aatrox *did* have a big impact, it's a 975 tier skin, they have a much more limited timeframe to make Victorious skins than they do most others, and they essentially have to force the theme onto one of a small set of champions.

But that's my entirely personal opinion.

As for Thresh and Braum, Thresh may have been tentatively disqualified because he has a Championship skin, I don't know what the process there is (or if there even is an established one), and Braum most likely had his new skin in the works at the time so they may have moved away from him for that reason when there were other viable options.

I also don't really follow pro-play except for semi-finals and finals so, I'm not really the best one to make comment on which champions were viable options :P
eww another skin that looks horrible

It seems riot doesn't care about the skins they give for ranked rewards anymore :/ I can buy a sub 975 skin thats better than the past few years victorious skins. :/ riot should consider fixing how they maintain the player base. Any chance u guys can give me a choice of a 975rp skin or a gemstone instead please, I'd rather not have that eye sore.
why did they make this, it basically looks like justicar

I agree with everyone else on this one, this basically looks like Justicar and Aatrox already just got a skin + Prestige. I think you guys can bend this around a bit or just pick a different champion. This skin lacks the punch given off by all the recent skins. I understand its a FREE skin but at least make it worth climbing to Gold+ for.
I love emotes...
lol wow thanks for justicar aatrox 2.0
asd
wont there be the victorious ward skin this year?
Mind that the Justicar skin is better looking as well.
